property.name: Flavor
property.value: A writhing mass of rot, with sharp claws and a vicious spirit.

card.name: Urborg Skeleton
card.property: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) {B}: Regenerate Urborg Skeleton. If Urborg Skeleton was kicked, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Yawgmoth's Agenda
card.property: You can't cast more than one spell each turn. You may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.name: Ancient Kavu
card.property: {2}: Ancient Kavu becomes colorless until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those with the ability to change their nature survived Phyrexia's biological attacks. Everything else died.

card.name: Bend or Break
card.property: Each player separates all nontoken lands they control into two piles. For each player, one of their piles is chosen by one of their opponents of their choice. Destroy all lands in the chosen piles. Tap all lands in the other piles.

card.name: Breath of Darigaaz
card.property: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.

card.name: Callous Giant
card.property: If a source would deal 3 or less damage to Callous Giant, prevent that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The invasion has awoken slumbering mountains," noted Urza. "Good. We can use all the help we can get."

card.name: Chaotic Strike
card.property: Cast this spell only during combat after blockers are declared. Flip a coin. If you win the flip, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Collapsing Borders
card.property: Domain — At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player gains 1 life for each basic land type among lands they control. Then Collapsing Borders deals 3 damage to that player.

card.name: Crown of Flames
card.property: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {R}: Return Crown of Flames to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All my life I've fought these monsters. Today I finish that fight." —Barrin

card.name: Firebrand Ranger
card.property: {G}, {T}: You may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A skilled ranger can glance at the mud on your boots and tell where you last camped.

card.name: Ghitu Fire
card.property: You may cast Ghitu Fire as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) Ghitu Fire deals X damage to any target.

card.name: Goblin Spy
card.property: Play with the top card of your library revealed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Isn't he on our side?" "Yep." "Why's he spyin' on us?" "Don't ask."

card.name: Halam Djinn
card.property: Haste Halam Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as red is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

card.name: Hooded Kavu
card.property: {B}: Hooded Kavu gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spread of its hood eclipses all hope.

card.name: Kavu Aggressor
card.property: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Kavu Aggressor can't block. If Kavu Aggressor was kicked, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Kavu Monarch
card.property: Kavu creatures have trample. Whenever another Kavu enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Kavu Monarch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kavu emerged all across Dominaria, but the first and the strongest came from Yavimaya.

card.name: Kavu Runner
card.property: Kavu Runner has haste as long as no opponent controls a white or blue creature.

card.name: Kavu Scout
card.property: Domain — Kavu Scout gets +1/+0 for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kavu evolved for centuries deep inside Dominaria, and some can draw from its strength.

card.name: Lightning Dart
card.property: Lightning Dart deals 1 damage to target creature. If that creature is white or blue, Lightning Dart deals 4 damage to it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Broken and punctured by dozens of Phyrexian portals, the angry sky began to spit lightning back at the world.

card.name: Loafing Giant
card.property: Whenever Loafing Giant attacks or blocks, put the top card of your library into your graveyard. If that card is a land card, prevent all combat damage Loafing Giant would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forget it. I'm not getting up today."

card.name: Mages' Contest
card.property: You and target spell's controller bid life. You start the bidding with a bid of 1. In turn order, each player may top the high bid. The bidding ends if the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid. If you win the bidding, counter that spell.

card.name: Maniacal Rage
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember me?" Tahngarth roared. "Now I'll repay you for my stay on Rath"

card.name: Obliterate
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For his family, Barrin made a funeral pyre of Tolaria.

card.name: Overload
card.property: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Destroy target artifact if its converted mana cost is 2 or less. If this spell was kicked, destroy that artifact if its converted mana cost is 5 or less instead.

card.name: Pouncing Kavu
card.property: Kicker {2}{R} (You may pay an additional {2}{R} as you cast this spell.) First strike If Pouncing Kavu was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with haste.

card.name: Rage Weaver
card.property: {2}: Target black or green creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

card.name: Rogue Kavu

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know how this one feels," said Urza. "It's not like others of its kind and has been shunned for its differences."

card.name: Ruby Leech
card.property: First strike Red spells you cast cost {R} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Its gems didn't stop pulsating until they were completely removed." —Tolarian research notes

card.name: Savage Offensive
card.property: Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.) Creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, they get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Scarred Puma
card.property: Scarred Puma can't attack unless a black or green creature also attacks.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not eager to lose the other eye.

card.name: Scorching Lava
card.property: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Scorching Lava deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, that creature can't be regenerated this turn and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Searing Rays
card.property: Choose a color. Searing Rays deals damage to each player equal to the number of creatures of that color that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is a battle of pawns, for the highest stakes imaginable." —Urza

card.name: Shivan Emissary
card.property: Kicker {1}{B} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} as you cast this spell.) When Shivan Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Shivan Harvest
card.property: {1} {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blood of your ancestors ran heavy on this soil. Now it's your turn to sacrifice for the glory of Shiv." —Viashino heretic

card.name: Skittish Kavu
card.property: Skittish Kavu gets +1/+1 as long as no opponent controls a white or blue creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fierce when roused, this breed of kavu is easily distracted by a strong voice or melodic tune.

card.name: Skizzik
card.property: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, if Skizzik wasn't kicked, sacrifice it.

card.property: {T}: Target land becomes a Swamp until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its slime liquefies the ground as efficiently as its fangs shred prey.

card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, for each defending player, separate all creatures that player controls into two piles and that player chooses one. Only creatures in the chosen piles can block this turn.

card.name: Stun
card.property: Target creature can't block this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They certainly are well protected. Too bad for them they're not well balanced." —Sisay

card.name: Tectonic Instability
card.property: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, tap all lands its controller controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Think of the problems we'll face if you uproot entire continents," said Urza. "I have," replied Teferi, "but the alternative is worse."

card.name: Thunderscape Apprentice
card.property: {B}, {T}: Target player loses 1 life. {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Thunderscape Master
Tribal Flames
card.property: Domain — Tribal Flames deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire is the universal language." —Jhoira, master artificer

card.name: Turf Wound
card.property: Target player can't play lands this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can't imagine how anyone lives in Shiv, let alone why they choose to stay." —Sisay

card.name: Urza's Rage
card.property: Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.) This spell can't be countered. Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Viashino Grappler
card.property: {G}: Viashino Grappler gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They've returned for the mana rig, but it no longer belongs to them." —Viashino bey

card.name: Zap
card.property: Zap deals 1 damage to any target. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All this time I thought Squee was useless," chuckled Sisay. "Who knew he'd be such a good shot?"

card.name: Aggressive Urge
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The power of the wild, concentrated in a single charge.

card.property: Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The battlefield is cluttered enough. Be still." —Multani, maro-sorcerer

card.name: Blurred Mongoose
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mongoose blew out its candle and was asleep in bed before the room went dark." —Llanowar fable

card.name: Canopy Surge
card.property: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Canopy Surge deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature with flying and each player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For what are leaves but countless blades To fight a countless foe on high." —Skyshroud hymn

card.name: Explosive Growth
card.property: Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.) Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Phyrexians descended, Multani paused to reflect on the beauty that might never be seen again.

card.name: Harrow

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No spot in nature is truly barren.

card.property: Green spells you cast cost {G} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It took magic to extract one of the stones and five people to carry it." —Tolarian research notes

card.property: This spell can't be countered. {G}: Kavu Chameleon becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They weren't part of my plan, but Gaea insisted." —Urza

card.name: Kavu Climber
card.property: When Kavu Climber enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The appearance of the first kavu surprised Multani. As they continued to emerge, he no longer had any doubts about Yavimaya's ability to defend herself.

card.name: Kavu Lair
card.property: Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield, its controller draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As a dark rain of Phyrexians fell from the sky, fountains of kavu erupted from the ground.

card.name: Kavu Titan
card.property: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.) If Kavu Titan was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it and with trample.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Llanowar rallied around Eladamri's banner and united in his name.

card.property: {2}: Target red or white creature gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

card.name: Nomadic Elf
card.property: {1} {G}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've journeyed across Dominaria. Phyrexians are everywhere. Plague is everywhere. There's no place left to hide."

card.property: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) If Pincer Spider was kicked, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.value: "Gaea's memory is eternal, and she exists in all things." —Molimo, maro-sorcerer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All elvenkind stood against Phyrexia. The Quirion nation deployed its most spiritual adepts, who wielded the power of their native soil.

card.property: When Quirion Trailblazer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.value: "All that matters is the path ahead."

card.name: Serpentine Kavu

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Under Yavimaya's peaceful facade beat the hearts of many savage beasts.

card.name: Tangle

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gaea battles rampant death with abundant life.

card.name: Thicket Elemental
card.property: Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.) When Thicket Elemental enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. If you do, put that card onto the battlefield and shuffle all other cards revealed this way into your library.

card.property: {R}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

Tranquility
card.property: Destroy all enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The plagues robbed Dominaria of all but its dreams. Eladamri hoped dreams were enough.

card.property: {2} {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

card.name: Utopia Tree
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor

card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor

property.value: Darigaaz decided his foe would be more useful as a weapon.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor

property.value: Unlike many hunters, these panthers have no need for camouflage. They're fast enough to catch any prey.

card.name: Ordered Migration
card.property: Domain — Create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Birds reach all parts of the world," said Barrin. "They will make excellent scouts."

card.name: Overabundance
card.property: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced, and Overabundance deals 1 damage to the player.

card.name: Plague Spores
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature and target land. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Breathe deep, Dominaria. Breathe deep and die." —Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

card.name: Pyre Zombie
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Pyre Zombie is in your graveyard, you may pay {1}{B}{B}. If you do, return Pyre Zombie to your hand. {1}{R}{R}, Sacrifice Pyre Zombie: It deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Raging Kavu
card.property: Flash Haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It took Yavimaya a thousand years to breed them, but it took only seconds for them to prove their worth.

card.name: Reckless Assault
card.property: {1}, Pay 2 life: Reckless Assault deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How will you fight an enemy that cares nothing for itself?" —The Blind Seer

card.name: Recoil
card.property: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anything sent into a plagued world is bound to come back infected.

card.name: Reviving Vapors
card.property: Reveal the top three cards of your library and put one of them into your hand. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost. Put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

card.name: Riptide Crab
card.property: Vigilance When Riptide Crab dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It sleeps with its claws open.

card.name: Rith, the Awakener
card.property: Flying Whenever Rith, the Awakener deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, choose a color, then create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each permanent of that color.

card.name: Sabertooth Nishoba
card.property: Trample, protection from blue and from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They sneer at the terrestrial dangers found on peaks and shores, eager to prove themselves against new and even mightier foes.

card.name: Samite Archer
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. {T}: Samite Archer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can preserve ten lives by taking one."

card.name: Seer's Vision
card.property: Your opponents play with their hands revealed. Sacrifice Seer's Vision: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Shivan Zombie
card.property: Protection from white

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Barbarians long for a glorious death in battle. Phyrexia was eager to grant that wish.

card.name: Simoon
card.property: Simoon deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hot wind whipped up as if the weather itself wanted to fight Phyrexians.

card.name: Sleeper's Robe
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

card.name: Slinking Serpent
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It winds its way through undergrowth as easily as it swims through shallows.

card.name: Smoldering Tar
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, target player loses 1 life. Sacrifice Smoldering Tar: It deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Spinal Embrace
card.property: Cast this spell only during combat. Untap target creature you don't control and gain control of it. It gains haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it. If you do, you gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Stalking Assassin
Sterling Grove
card.property: Other enchantments you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.) {1}, Sacrifice Sterling Grove: Search your library for an enchantment card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

card.name: Teferi's Moat
card.property: As Teferi's Moat enters the battlefield, choose a color. Creatures of the chosen color without flying can't attack you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Isolation is not the answer."—Urza, to Teferi

card.name: Treva, the Renewer
card.property: Flying Whenever Treva, the Renewer deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, choose a color, then you gain 1 life for each permanent of that color.

card.name: Tsabo Tavoc
card.property: First strike, protection from legendary creatures {B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target legendary creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I might almost pity my enemies—if it wasn't so amusing to watch them die."

card.name: Undermine
card.property: Counter target spell. Its controller loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Which would you like first, the insult or the injury?"

card.name: Urborg Drake
card.property: Flying Urborg Drake attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Relentless as the sea, remorseless as death.

card.name: Vicious Kavu
card.property: Whenever Vicious Kavu attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As battle raged in Shiv, a strange new ally appeared from below the ravaged ground.

card.name: Vile Consumption
card.property: All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay 1 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The plague moved faster than an army and was far more deadly.

card.name: Vodalian Zombie
card.property: Protection from green

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every last one of you will become my servant. It's a shame you won't live to see the irony." —Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

card.name: Void
card.property: Choose a number. Destroy all artifacts and creatures with converted mana cost equal to that number. Then target player reveals their hand and discards all nonland cards with converted mana cost equal to the number.

card.name: Voracious Cobra
card.property: First strike Whenever Voracious Cobra deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's no known antidote for the cobra's venom . . . or its appetite.

card.name: Wings of Hope
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza knew Phyrexians would come through the air and sent his soldiers to greet them.

card.name: Yavimaya Barbarian
card.property: Protection from blue

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all elves embrace the pastoral life. Some still roam the forest's edge, forever making war against their hated enemies.

card.name: Yavimaya Kavu
card.property: Yavimaya Kavu's power is equal to the number of red creatures on the battlefield. Yavimaya Kavu's toughness is equal to the number of green creatures on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kavu hunt prey in packs—one kavu hunts a pack of prey.

card.name: Stand // Deliver

alternate.name: Deliver

card.name: Alloy Golem
card.property: As Alloy Golem enters the battlefield, choose a color. Alloy Golem is the chosen color. (It's still an artifact.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We turned old weapons into new warriors." —Jhoira, master artificer

card.name: Bloodstone Cameo
card.property: {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The stone whispers to me of dragon's fire and darkness. I wish I'd never pried it from the figurehead of that sunken Keldon longship." —Isel, master carver

card.name: Chromatic Sphere
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Sphere: Add one mana of any color. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let insight and energy be your guides." —The Blind Seer, to Gerrard

card.name: Crosis's Attendant
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice Crosis's Attendant: Add {U}{B}{R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Crosis is the eye of the ur-dragon, piercing illusion and darkness."

card.name: Darigaaz's Attendant
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice Darigaaz's Attendant: Add {B}{R}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Darigaaz is the breath of the ur-dragon, burning away the burdens of mortality."

card.name: Drake-Skull Cameo
card.property: {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A strange skull was turned up by an Ephran farmer's plow. I traded a copper ring for the 'ox skull.' It resonates of the sea and danger." —Isel, master carver

card.name: Dromar's Attendant
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice Dromar's Attendant: Add {W}{U}{B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dromar is the wings of the ur-dragon, sweeping away all opposition."

card.name: Juntu Stakes
card.property: Creatures with power 1 or less don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who can't survive are of no consequence." —Tsabo Tavoc

card.name: Lotus Guardian
card.property: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lotus fields are too valuable to leave undefended.

card.name: Phyrexian Altar
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your life was meaningless, but your death will glorify Yawgmoth." —Tsabo Tavoc

card.name: Phyrexian Lens
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's nothing I wouldn't give to achieve victory. Can you say the same?" —Tsabo Tavoc, to Gerrard

card.name: Planar Portal
card.property: {6}, {T}: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sky split, and the air crackled and roiled. The Phyrexian invasion of Dominaria had finally begun.

card.name: Power Armor
card.property: Domain — {3}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.

card.property: {1}, Sacrifice Rith's Attendant: Add {R}{G}{W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rith is the claw of the ur-dragon, scattering seeds of devastation."

card.name: Seashell Cameo
card.property: {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Today a seashell fell from the empty sky here in Kinymu, a hundred leagues from the sea. I'm torn—shall I carve a woman or a bird?" —Isel, master carver

card.name: Sparring Golem
card.property: Whenever Sparring Golem becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Part drill sergeant, part training dummy," thought Gerrard. "I hope it can stand up to a real war."

card.name: Tek
card.property: Tek gets +0/+2 as long as you control a Plains, has flying as long as you control an Island, gets +2/+0 as long as you control a Swamp, has first strike as long as you control a Mountain, and has trample as long as you control a Forest.

card.name: Tigereye Cameo
card.property: {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An elvish adventurer unearthed this stone in Jolrael's jungle. Now it's truly fit for display in one of her palaces." —Isel, master carver

card.name: Treva's Attendant
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice Treva's Attendant: Add {G}{W}{U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Treva is the voice of the ur-dragon, demanding cries of worship."

card.name: Troll-Horn Cameo
card.property: {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I found a troll-horn fragment in the wooded foothills of Hurloon, and it keeps growing larger. I wonder, is the horn recreating itself or the troll?" —Isel, master carver

property.value: "It's a tool for aiding my other tools," explained Urza. "Now they'll work in harmony."

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Llanowar has seven elfhames, or kingdoms, each with its own ruler. Their palaces are objects of awe, wonder, and envy.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the hardiest explorers survive to eat the fruit.
